time_sand.description: Sand that seems to flow backwards in time.

time_vision.name: Time Vision
time_vision.description: A vision crystallized from temporal energies.

tin_ore.name: Tin Ore
tin_ore.description: A soft metal ore used in alloy crafting.

titan_hammer.name: Titan's Hammer
titan_hammer.description: A massive hammer once wielded by the ancient titans, required to access the Titan's Worksite.

titanstone.name: Titanstone
titanstone.description: Massive stone blocks carved by the ancient titans.

toxic_bloom.name: Toxic Bloom
toxic_bloom.description: A deadly flower with potent poison. Used in combat potions and alchemy.

trapped_animal.name: Trapped Animal
trapped_animal.description: An animal caught in a trap.

trapped_animal_premium.name: Premium Trapped Animal
trapped_animal_premium.description: An exceptionally fine animal caught in a trap.

trapped_animal_quality.name: Quality Trapped Animal
trapped_animal_quality.description: A higher quality animal caught in a trap.

trapped_bird.name: Trapped Bird
trapped_bird.description: A bird caught in a trap.

trapped_monster.name: Trapped Monster
trapped_monster.description: A dangerous monster caught in a trap.

trapped_rodent.name: Trapped Rodent
trapped_rodent.description: A small rodent caught in a trap.

travertine.name: Travertine
travertine.description: Beautiful travertine stone with unique patterns.

treasure_chest.name: Treasure Chest
treasure_chest.description: A special chest that can be opened to reveal rare loot. Right-click to open.

consumableEffect.description: Opens the chest to reveal random loot

treasure_hunting_xp_potion.name: Treasure Hunting Experience Potion
treasure_hunting_xp_potion.description: An alchemy-crafted treasure hunting experience potion.

tree_bark.name: Tree Bark
tree_bark.description: Bark stripped from trees, useful for crafting.

troll_blood.name: Troll Blood
troll_blood.description: The blood of a troll, known for its regenerative properties.

troll_hide.name: Troll Hide
troll_hide.description: Tough hide from a troll, excellent for armor crafting.

trophy_hunter_license.name: Trophy Hunter's License
trophy_hunter_license.description: A license allowing access to elite trophy hunting grounds.

tropical_fish.name: Tropical Fish
tropical_fish.description: A colorful fish from tropical waters.

ultimate_component.name: Ultimate Component
ultimate_component.description: The ultimate crafting component, stolen from legendary sources.

ultimate_hunting_mastery_token.name: Ultimate Hunting Mastery Token
ultimate_hunting_mastery_token.description: The ultimate symbol of hunting mastery. Unlocks access to the Ultimate Hunter's Sanctuary.

uncommon_herb.name: Uncommon Herb
uncommon_herb.description: A moderately rare herb with enhanced properties for alchemy.

uncommon_item.name: Uncommon Item
uncommon_item.description: An uncommon item used in enchanting.

uncommon_trinket.name: Uncommon Trinket
uncommon_trinket.description: A decorative trinket of moderate value.

valuable_trinket.name: Valuable Trinket
valuable_trinket.description: A valuable trinket stolen from a merchant, can be sold or used in crafting.

vampire_fang.name: Vampire Fang
vampire_fang.description: A fang from a vampire, still sharp and deadly.

venom_blade.name: Venom Blade
venom_blade.description: A blade coated with deadly venom.

venom_dagger.name: Venom Dagger
venom_dagger.description: A dagger coated with deadly venom.

void_crystal.name: Void Crystal
void_crystal.description: A crystal containing void energy, used in advanced runecrafting and enchanting.

void_essence.name: Void Essence
void_essence.description: Essence drawn from the void, containing immense power.

void_fish.name: Void Fish
void_fish.description: A mysterious fish touched by void energy.

void_key.name: Void Key
void_key.description: A key forged from the void itself, required to access the Void Stone Mine.

void_stone.name: Void Stone
void_stone.description: Stone from the void between dimensions.

water.name: Water
water.description: Pure water used in alchemy and cooking.

water_core.name: Water Core
water_core.description: The core of a water elemental.

wild_carrot.name: Wild Carrot
wild_carrot.description: A wild root vegetable with nutritional value.

wild_spice.name: Wild Spice
wild_spice.description: Aromatic spices that enhance cooking and alchemy.

wildflower.name: Wildflower
wildflower.description: A beautiful wildflower found in meadows. Used in early alchemy recipes.

wolf_pelt.name: Wolf Pelt
wolf_pelt.description: The pelt of a dire wolf.

wooden_shield.name: Wooden Shield
wooden_shield.description: A basic wooden shield for defense.

world_tree_nectar.name: World Tree Nectar
world_tree_nectar.description: Sacred nectar from the World Tree that provides incredible restoration and bonuses.

world_tree_sapling.name: World Tree Sapling
world_tree_sapling.description: A sapling from the World Tree itself. Radiates with primal life force. Unlocks the World Tree Nexus.

yew_berry.name: Yew Berry
yew_berry.description: Rare berries from yew trees with unique properties.

yew_log.name: Yew Log
yew_log.description: A rare log from a yew tree, used for advanced crafting.
